channel.title: inclusion on AWMP
channel.description: Recent content in inclusion on AWMP

item.title: Diversity reading group
item.description: A reading group about research on gender gap, participation of women and minorities in academia and the job market. If you want to join, contact us!

item.title: Hybrid conferences group
item.description: A working group discussing how to promote conferences which admit online participation, and hence are much more inclusive.
